description_html: As collaborative and learning environments have become more relaxed, the adaptability of limited space, reconfiguring needs and comfort are still key. Flirt's nesting capability and ease of mobility provide endless configuration opportunities, ensuring all manners of gathering are achieved with ease. It also appeals from a visual standpoint, with a light-scale modern design that beckons whether in use or in the nested position. Multi-functional in smaller corporate settings or sprawled across larger educational institutions, the accommodating abilities of Flirt fits them all - and everything in between.
